metaTitle: LE MANS Orihuela Costa | 3-Bed Villas from €509,000
metaDescription: Discover LE MANS by MNB in Orihuela Costa. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €509,000. Ready January 2026. Near beaches, golf & amenities.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to LE MANS, an exclusive residential development by MNB located in the prestigious Los Altos area of Orihuela Costa, Alicante. This is more than just a home—it's an investment in your Costa Blanca lifestyle. Each villa features 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 modern bathrooms, and a generous 158m² of carefully designed living space set on 181m² plots. With prices starting from just €509,000, LE MANS represents exceptional value, positioned 35% below Costa Blanca North comparable properties. The development delivers on January 1st, 2026, offering a turnkey solution for buyers seeking quality construction, contemporary finishes, and strategic proximity to the region's most sought-after amenities. MNB has established a trusted reputation for excellence in Orihuela Costa, and LE MANS exemplifies their commitment to creating vibrant communities where families and investors thrive. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or rental investment, LE MANS delivers on all fronts.

locationSection.intro: Los Altos in Orihuela Costa is the heart of the Costa Blanca's most dynamic community. This thriving neighbourhood harmoniously blends Mediterranean charm with modern convenience, attracting a cosmopolitan mix of British, Scandinavian, and Dutch residents who appreciate the region's exceptional quality of life. The area is renowned for its proximity to world-class golf courses, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. Orihuela Costa's strategic position on the southern Costa Blanca offers an authentic Spanish experience without sacrificing accessibility to essential services. English is widely spoken throughout the community, making it exceptionally welcoming for international buyers. The neighbourhood boasts excellent shopping options, quality dining establishments, and a strong expat infrastructure that ensures newcomers feel immediately at home. Property values in Orihuela Costa have appreciated steadily at +10% year-on-year, making it an increasingly attractive investment destination.
highlights: Beach: La Zenia (Blue Flag) - 8 minutes by car
Golf: Villamartín - on the doorstep (5 minutes)
Shopping: La Zenia Boulevard & Mercadona - 10 minutes
Schools: El Limonar - 15 minutes, Kings College Murcia - 40 minutes

propertyFeatures.intro: LE MANS villas showcase premium construction standards and contemporary design principles throughout. MNB has prioritized durability, comfort, and aesthetic appeal in every detail. Each villa features high-quality materials, modern finishes, and energy-efficient systems designed for year-round comfort in the Mediterranean climate. The open-plan living spaces maximize natural light, while private outdoor areas extend your living experience into the surrounding landscape. Every property benefits from MNB's commitment to structural excellence, backed by a comprehensive 10-year warranty.
features: Private swimming pool with integrated design
Double glazing with thermal break insulation
Modern bathroom fixtures with quality sanitaryware
Video entry system and security features

content.investmentSection: Orihuela Costa represents one of the Costa Blanca's most compelling investment opportunities. Property values have appreciated consistently at +10% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation and demonstrating robust market fundamentals. LE MANS villas present dual-income potential: strong holiday rental returns averaging €800 per week for 7-night bookings, or long-term rental stability for buy-to-let investors. The development's pricing at €2,100/m² remains 35% lower than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North, offering substantial value for discerning buyers. The established expat community generates year-round rental demand, while the region's tourism infrastructure supports seasonal occupancy. With delivery scheduled for January 2026, investors gain immediate market entry at pre-completion pricing. MNB's reputation ensures professional property management support and strong completion certainty, making LE MANS an intelligent addition to diversified investment portfolios.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in prestigious Los Altos neighbourhood
Trusted developer MNB with proven track record
Modern 3-bedroom villa design optimized for comfort
Exceptional value at 35% below Costa Blanca North
Strong international community—British, Scandinavian, Dutch residents
Direct access to La Zenia Blue Flag beach (8 minutes)
Villamartín golf course on the doorstep

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in LE MANS?
faqs.answer: LE MANS villas start from €509,000. Each property features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 158m² of living space, and a private pool. Current availability is limited to 1 unit. Contact us for pricing details and available options.

faqs.question: When will LE MANS be completed?
faqs.answer: LE MANS will be delivered on January 1st, 2026. MNB provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty covering all defects and ensuring your peace of mind. Contact us for specific delivery timelines and payment schedule options.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of LE MANS?
faqs.answer: MNB is the developer. They have established a strong track record constructing quality residential developments throughout Orihuela Costa and the broader Alicante region. MNB is committed to excellence in design, construction quality, and customer service.

faqs.question: Is Orihuela Costa a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Orihuela Costa offers exceptional value with property prices 35% below Costa Blanca North. The area features strong international communities including British, Scandinavian, and Dutch residents with English widely spoken. Property values appreciate at +10% year-on-year, excellent amenities include Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), La Zenia Blue Flag beach (8 minutes), and world-class golf courses.

faqs.question: How far is LE MANS from the beach?
faqs.answer: LE MANS is just 8 minutes by car from La Zenia beach, which features the prestigious Blue Flag award for water quality and safety. Campoamor and Cabo Roig beaches are also easily accessible, providing multiple options for coastal recreation.

faqs.question: What amenities are near LE MANS?
faqs.answer: LE MANS enjoys proximity to comprehensive amenities: Hospital de Torrevieja (15 minutes), Villamartín golf course (5 minutes), La Zenia Boulevard shopping centre (10 minutes), Mercadona and Consum supermarkets, El Limonar school (15 minutes), and diverse dining establishments throughout Los Altos.

content.conclusion: LE MANS represents a rare opportunity to acquire a premium villa in one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable communities at an exceptional price point. With delivery confirmed for January 2026, you're securing your investment before final prices adjust upward. The combination of modern design, trusted developer reputation, strategic location, and proven investment fundamentals makes LE MANS an intelligent choice for discerning buyers seeking Mediterranean lifestyle and financial appreciation. Whether you're establishing a permanent residence, creating a holiday escape, or building rental income, LE MANS delivers on every level. The strong expat community ensures seamless integration, while proximity to world-class beaches, golf courses, and healthcare facilities enhances your quality of life. Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of the Costa Blanca lifestyle. Contact us via WhatsApp today for exclusive details, available units, and personalized investment consultation. Your Costa Blanca dream begins with LE MANS.

distances.beach: 8 minutes to La Zenia Blue Flag beach
distances.shopping: 10 minutes to La Zenia Boulevard shopping centre
distances.restaurants: 5-10 minutes to diverse dining establishments in Los Altos
